mng: notice or announcement, list of names, public roll of successful examinees

exm.mng: the charts (of best-sellers), table of ranking
to beat, to flog, to whip
to fail the imperial exams, to flunk
to flaunt, to advertise, to parade, boost, excessive praise
lit. tablet with inscription in gold, pass list for the top imperial examinations, roll of honor
candidate who came second in the Han-lin examination, see 狀元|状元[zhuang4 yuan2]
to win top marks in the imperial examinations
table of scores (in exams or sports league)
